channel.title: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!
channel.description:
hey guys, i'm using hyperion as a base for my server, and i just recently got tharoks compiler or wateva for it, (hyperion does not come with it's own compiler) anyway, when i compile it says this:
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/70krx4.jpg[/img]
i don't know if thats suppose to happen , but it usually says no errors or something, (i'm a newbie with private servers) any help with that will be much appretiated, now for the run.bat part... same thing, i dont know whats wrong but when i click run.bat this happens:
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/15wjxhw.jpg[/img]
any help with this and i will be very very thankful! cheers
- an3s

item.title: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.source: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!

item.title: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!
item.dc:creator: @an3s an3s
item.description:
@an3s wrote:

[quote=“redrover, post:8, topic:356276”]Open up Eclipse.

got File > New > Java Project.

Pick a Project-Name, Choose ur Source Location, Then finish, it should load it and u could run it[/quote]

can i add you on msn real quick please? taylor-nathan@hotmail.com

  • thanks

Read full topic

@redrover wrote:

Open up Eclipse.

got File > New > Java Project.

Pick a Project-Name, Choose ur Source Location, Then finish, it should load it and u could run it

item.source: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!

item.title: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!
item.dc:creator: @an3s an3s
item.description:
@an3s wrote:

[quote=“redrover, post:6, topic:356276”]If you’re using Hyperion i highly suggest using “Eclipse”, Runs server, Compiles automaticly, just needs server restart, Find errors, even tells u how to fix it.

but if you want run.bat and Compile.bat :

Run.bat

@echo off
java -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar org.hyperion.Server
pause

Compile.bat

@echo off
:sha
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/jython.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/xpp.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar -d bin src/org/hyperion/*.java src/org/hyperion/data/*.java src/org/hyperion/fileserver/*.java src/org/hyperion/ls/*.java src/org/hyperion/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/index/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/map/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/index/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/action/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/event/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/container/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/container/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/region/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/net/ondemand/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/task/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/task/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/packet/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/net/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/*.java src/org/hyperion/util/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/event/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/action/*.java
pause
goto sha

there u go.[/quote]

ive got a run.bat and can you help me with eclipse? i’ve got it downloaded i just don’t know how to use

Read full topic
item.source: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!

item.title: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

If you’re using Hyperion i highly suggest using “Eclipse”, Runs server, Compiles automaticly, just needs server restart, Find errors, even tells u how to fix it.

but if you want run.bat and Compile.bat :

Run.bat

@echo off
java -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar org.hyperion.Server
pause

Compile.bat

@echo off
:sha
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/jython.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/xpp.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar -d bin src/org/hyperion/*.java src/org/hyperion/data/*.java src/org/hyperion/fileserver/*.java src/org/hyperion/ls/*.java src/org/hyperion/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/index/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/map/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/index/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/action/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/event/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/container/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/container/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/region/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/net/ondemand/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/task/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/task/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/packet/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/net/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/*.java src/org/hyperion/util/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/event/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/action/*.java
pause
goto sha

there u go.

item.title: Errors with compile.bat? and run.bat please help!
item.dc:creator: @an3s an3s
item.description:
@an3s wrote:

[quote=“Ground zero 317, post:2, topic:356276”]try this

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause [/quote]

just edited my compiler and put that in, now it says:

javac: file not found: src\server\event\*.java
Usage: javac (options) (source files)
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue...

any suggestions?

Read full topic
